text: (15 January 1943 â€“ 15 September 2018) was a Japanese actress. She was known for her work in Japanese cinema and television. Kiki was born in Tokyo. Kiki was known for her roles in Ballad of Orin, The Triple Cross and in Half a Confession. Kiki died of breast cancer in Tokyo on 15 September 2018 at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Japan Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Kirin Kiki
